content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv late thursday night at my house in calumet city il. my town borders on the south side of chicago and i'm also three blocks west of indiana. at around 2 a.M. i turned off the t.V. and went outside for a cigarette. it was a clear night and good for star gazing, well as clear as you can get for chicago. you really can't see that many stars do to all the light pollution in the sky. on a clear night you might see about twenty or thirty stars. i was in my driveway facing east leaning against the front of my car just about to light my cigarette. when i noticed a shooting star out of the left corner of my eye. as i stared at it and then focused on it i realized it wasn't a shooting star. in fact there were three lights, i could also clearly see the shape of the object do to all the yellowish haze from all the street lights. it was a black perfect equilateral shaped triangle. the body of the craft seemed to obsorb any light that was hitting it. i saw that it seemed to be powered by these three engine. there was an engine slightly recessed from every corner of the triangle. i'm not sure how i can explain this but the color of the light that was comming from the engines was the exact shade of light blue you would see from a medium bright star in the sky. the object stayed on a straight path heading south/southeast. it was clear to me that it was also gaining altitude as well as speed.The object was flying upward at about a 15 dagree angle. as i kept starring at the object i could tell that the star colored light/engines were doing somesort of  pulsing action i really don't know how else to describe it they didn't turn any brighter they just seemed to have more depth. the only way i can think to describe it would be if you cut a barrel in half open end down and the higher it object went the more deeper the blue orb/star light went into the engine. i should also mention that all three engine/lights faced downward. i only saw the object for 1 1/2 to 2 seconds and then it was out of my veiw. the whole time i faced east from the first moment i saw the object. it stayed in my viewing range from my 10 o,clock to my 2 o,clock. the object also made no noise at all and was completly silent. there are a few things that i should mention, my house is directly under the most busiest flight path from the east coust to chicago's o'hare and midway airports i've lived here for twenty seven years and never in that time seen a plane fly from  northwest going southeast they always come from the east and southeast. hundreds of plans fly over my house everyday and everyone of them is comming in for a landing or in a final approach. after my sighting of the object and few cigarettes i went in and reported a 
"unusual looking"  craft to the bureaus of aviations 24hour headquarters in chicago. the opperator told me that everything was going to be kept on record and that it will be sent thru the proper channels sir..  i was just hoping she'd tell me i wasn't the only one calling but no such luck. well thats just about everything, if there is one piece of advice i can give next time your watching a shooting star ...Look a little closer
content.summary: I wittnessed a black silent equilateral triangle shapped object with three star like engines flying at a very high speed southeast heading over chicagoland.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting around the campfire at the cabin. celebrating multiple b-days with relatives and friends. i am an amatuer astronomer so i am always looking up. i noticd 4 white lights moving rather fast, just south of polaris.
 by the time i told someone to look. all 4 lights stopped and went in a right angle up and dissappeared into the stars.
 i went "whoaaa!" and everyone said "have another one"
i told them what i saw, and obviously no one believed me.
 then about 10 min's later. there they were again! only a slightly different pattern this time and they appeared out of nowhere. i told everyne to look up. they finally saw them. they zigzagged across the northern sky, and then slowly moved up until they just dissappeared.
 i know it was no satellite, no upper atmosphere disturbance/ auroura. or any astronomical phenom. it was very unlikly to be a plane twice! aspecially the second time zigzagging. 
 one of the girls was visibally shaken, i was very intrigued at what happened and started to dismiss all factors that it could have been. i felt, "well i know they are out there, i just got lucky and saw one!" (4?)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 lights (white) in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: A mililtary rocket carrying satellite as described on the website:  space.Com.  it was not a ufo.  it was a public launch.
content.summary: Rocket fired into the sky from vandenburg afb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on us-1 in the downtown area of ft lauderdale and above me about one degree eastward i saw what appeared to be a rocket or meteor like with a lit tail that faded and immediately thereafter it reignited and then vanished.

also, about a year or so previous to that sighting i was driving north on us-1 at approximately the same time and also above me but about a degree west i saw a bright tiny light that went on and just as quickly it went off three times.  it moved very quickly.  i saw it first north, then almost above me and then behind me.  it traveled so quickly that this event did not take more than a second.

both incidents traveled from north to south.
content.summary: Southbound rocket like

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a field , near a beach when me and my two friends looked up too see a ship hovering, it stood still for about 3 seconds after we made eye contact with it, and then zoomed away and out of sight in a split second , it seemed to be silver, very bright, very fast, and not of this world , we were quite shocked, and didnt speak for about a minute afterwards , and then ran to our cottege
content.summary: Me and two friends looked up and saw a ship hovering , it then flew off at incredible speed ....

content.detailedDescription:
One night as i lay on my back, playing my guitar, on a lounge chair under the night sky there it was. it appeared from the west heading east. there was two giant oak trees to the west. it appeared over them and i was in awe. kinda dumb-founded. as it headed east it was coming to the tree line to the east. so i layed my guitar down and ran to the road on the south and watched it as it slowly floated east. then all of a sudden, it just turned off. nothing was there. i tell you that it was shaped as a rectangle. a rectangle of light. all of it and it was silent. i have never seen nothing like it and have never seen nothing like it again.
 to clear things up.....I took an iq. test and rated 139, which is a genius level, so i know i am not nuts like some have suggested and laughed about my story.
  oh well, i hope that you find this story as fascinating as i always have.
                             sincerely,
                                 larry
content.summary: Silent rectangle of light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Monday
september 19, 2005 
10:30 p.M. (approximate)

i a licensed radio operator and a trained weather spotter. on this evening i was outside to make weather observations while attempting to capture the intense lightning with my digital camera (sony cyber-shot dsc p-150). the camera is capable of 7.2 mega pixels but was set to 3.0 mega pixels when this picture was taken.  all other settings were set to normal or default. 
while facing toward the southeast an object of light came into my field of vision on the left.  i looked up and took one picture of three white lights (twice the size of an average star).  the lights were in a triangular shape, 60 to 75 degrees above the horizon, and were moving toward the east-south east.

the ceiling was between 1000k -2000k feet. the object was in view and passed silently overhead for about 10 seconds to 20 seconds before disappearing into the clouds.
content.summary: Three lights in a triangular form passed silently overhead

content.detailedDescription:
After we returned home, i went on google to find places to report this sighting. i found arizona ufo website, and yours. 
we saw exactly what someone else saw, almost 3 years ago. we also saw more!

this is the quote i copied (from a 2002 sighting on az ufo website), then i'll give full details of what we saw.

occurred : 3/15/2002 19:15 (entered as : 03-15-02 19:15)
location : glendale, az
shape : circle 

((nuforc note: report of missile launch from vandenberg afb. pd)) 

lighted object vaporized in a cloud of "fog" before my eyes. 

we saw a light like an airplane coming toward us. it had what looked like fog all around it with a light aiming toward the ground. suddenly it looked like it was getting covered with a big cloud of fog, then the fog began to clear and the light was completely gone. the light didn't go off in any direction. it seemed to vaporize. then the fog cloud disappeared. if there was any sound we were too far away to hear it. 

our report:
date 9/22/2005
location: payson, az
time: approx 19:20 (mst)

while driving westward on highway 260 (from our home in chaparral pines) towards payson, we saw a huge, bright light over the hills that looked like the headlight (is there such a term) on a commercial airliner. it illuminated a large part of the skuy, and a big cloud of fog. our experience was exactly like what was reported above.
however, after the light and cloud dissapeard, we saw what looked like about 3 spirals (kinda like a slinky) on the horizon, that were amber in color. the sky was pitch black on the horizon, yet this bands were very bright, and not moving. as we drove westward towards them, i tried to drive through part of town to get to a clearing for a better view. we couldn't get to a good clearing, and eventually lost sight of and could not see the lights again.
my wife and i are both in our mid-40s, and very skeptical of these things...But we are convinced of what we saw...And frankly, a little freaked out about it all.
feel free to contact us should you want/need any further information, or have suggestions on where else i should post this notice.
cj & mary zilveti
content.summary: Extremely bright light/vapor cloud/amber spirals in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm an amateur astronomer.  i was in my back yard doing some naked-eye stargazing.  about 8:45 pm cdt i noticed a solid, white unblinking light moving due north. it appeared a few degrees east of alioth, the 1st star in the handle of the big dipper. at that time it was about 40 degrees above the nw horizon, at an azimuth of 315 degrees.  by it's brightness (about the same as alioth at magnitude 1.8) and speed i assumed that it was a satellite in low orbit.  i watched it for maybe 30 seconds, until it was near megrez, in the upper left corner of the "dipper", then looked away. that's about 5 degrees south of where it started.

less than a minute later i looked back and it was gone.  instead there was a much dimmer light but moving at exactly the same speed and over exactly the same path, but in the opposite direction.  i'd estimate it's brightness as similar to megrez, or magnitude 3.3.  it disappeared within a minute when it was a little south of alioth.  there was no noise, no change in color or brightness or direction except that presumed course reversal.

btw, i used astronomy software to get all these numbers except duration. that's an estimate.  everything else is accurate.

i tried to find out what i saw. i had seen a satellite about 15 minutes earlier in another part of the sky.  when i checked to see what satellites were visible between 8:20 and 9:20 i was able to identify that first satellite, but no satellites passed close to alioth at all. i'm also an amateur pilot, and i doubt it was an aircraft; there were no running lights and no strobes.  it couldn't have been a landing light because it got dimmer, not brighter, as it moved south.  

i know this is not exactly a major sighting but this is the 1st moving thing i've ever seen in the sky that i couldn't readily identify, and i've been looking for a long time --- i'm 58.
content.summary: What looked like satellite disappeared, then reappeared moving in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription:
Dining with friends in laguna beach.
friend called & said go outside & look in the sky.
i thought ufo.
flying beacon of light, looping then flew off over the ocean.
interesting & want to know what it was.
it faded from sight all most suddenly over the ocean.
content.summary: Flying beacon of wide light, made some spiral loops leaving glowing trail faded from sight over ocean

content.detailedDescription:
it was saturday, sept. 17, 2005 at around 10:00pm. i stepped outside to have a cigarette. i immediately noticed what looked like a bright, orange star in the horizon. i sat and watched it, never taking my eyes off it. it hovered for about 2 minutes, then slowly moved down and to the left. then it moved back to its origional position. then it moved slowly down and to the right. it looked suspicious to me, and i knew it wasn't a helicopter or an airplane. it made no noise. i ran inside to get my camcorder, i was only gone for about 15 seconds. when i came back out the object was considerably closer to where i was. i started filming it, and zoomed in on it. it appeared to be a circular, large object, and it was on fire. the fire coming off it was so bright it lit up the sky. the object was decending slowly, and away from my position. it was leaving a trail of smoke and fire behind it, but the object remained intacked. it also appeared to be pulsating a white light as it was on fire as well.
      at that point, it could have been mistaken for a comet, but comets dont hover. it continued to decend away from me, and then hovered above the tree line of a wooded area about 3/4 mile from me. it didn't crash or explode. it landed softly and quietly in the woods. while it was on the ground, it still was very bright and glowing. within a few seconds, all the fire and light on the object went out completely. i sat and waited to hear sirens or people screaming, but nothing happened! how could i be the only one to see this! i waited till about midnight, but no sign of it taking back off or relighting. i am worried it is still there.
   monday morning i took the tape to kxxv news channel 25. i showed the footage to newsreporter keba arnold. she was shocked when she saw the tape, and didn't know what it was, either. she said she was going to call the local pd and the military to see what she could find out. i called her later that day and she said she sent her copy of the footage to their waco office. she said a producer up there thought it was a flare! this thing is huge and it hovered and moved around! 
     if you want to see the footage you can reach keba at 254-526-6720. and it wasn't a flare or helicopter, or airplane, or comet, or hot air balloon, or the goodyear blimp. i hope you have better luck with it than i did.
content.summary: Large fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside my apartment and noticed a very bright light that was stretched out like a line against the clear black night sky. at the left end of the light trail, i noticed an object that was moving at very high speeds and the light source seemed to have been coming from some sort of exhaust. it stopped dispersing this trail of light in the same way a pilot would use smoke to write things in the sky and then shut off the smoke. then the object just disappeared. 10 seconds later, it appeared again (not at the same spot it disappeared), which is when i started to record the object with my phone's video camera function. it remained in the sky for another minute and again disappeared. both my girlfriend and i have witnessed the phenomena. i do not have a computer link for my phone which contains the video, but i am very willing to share it with whoever can tell me what it was i just saw. even though the object disappeared...The light trail remained and did not even dissolve in the sky like smoke would. in fact...The light turned from a very bright white/blue to a bright red/pink. no clouds visible.
content.summary: Small craft. left behind a very potent light-like trail of smoke?

content.detailedDescription:
1. in my house my wife called me outside
2. it had a huge tale like a comet bright white 
3. i thought it was a comet but it was close to close and all of a sudden the huge white tale appx 2-3 mile wide turned off like a light. 
4. it moved fast, had the 2-3 mile wided take bright white it was close to earth , other air craft was around and then the tale turned off and the objected dissapeared
5. i have seen comets before but it looked like a aircraft the had a spot light that could shot a light 2-3 miles wide it did seeem right. 
6. it disspeared
content.summary: Looked like a commet bright tale huge fast then , tale was gone and craft

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out to back yard,it was revolving fast and was round in object. i knew what it was. it wasnt an air plane.I went to the back bedroom but couldnt see it.It was as large is a baseball.
content.summary: Looked out back window saw a red circular object revolving moving from left to right.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car down route 30 towards greensburg.  i saw a very bright light hovering in the sky in the distance.  at first i thought it was the moon or a tower light, but i had never seen it there before.  it was too bright to be a tower and too small to be the moon, plus i could see the moon.  the object stood still for a few seconds and then moved straight up slightly, then fell out of the sky at a 45 degree angle.  it fell very low to the ground, i thought that maybe it hit ground.  it fell directly in front of me and to my right.  it fell below the level of the buildings in the area, but i was unsure of its exact distance away.  it startled me.  i drove towards it down pittsburgh street trying to see if i could still see it, but it was gone.  i know it wasn't a comet because it lacked a tail it was just a ball of white light.  i was at the top of the hill and i tried to get closer, but once i was in the valley i turned around and went home.  it was in about the same area that i was in a few weeks ago, but the other time it was a series of three green flashes of light in the sky, big enough to see from a great distance.  i was inside at the time, but immediately after the last flash all the power in the area went out, it only went out for a minute or so, but i think that the two events were connected.  this would have been about the same time last month.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: White ball of light fell out of the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house who lives a few blocks away. i notice a triangler shaped object with three circular lights, one light on each point of the triangle. this object was floating in the direction toward toronto cn tower from mississauga's lake shore area. at first i thought this object might be a blimp then i thought a triangler shaped blimp? never seen one of those before. at this time of night? hmmm as i was walking home i notice this oriental lady walking by. i remember thinking to myself should i stop this lady and ask her if she sees the samething. i'm not sure if i ask or not. but i remember coming home seeing my brother outside having a smoke as the object floated away over lake ontario.
content.summary: Triangler shape ufo with three circular lights one on each point

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed, i looked out my back to see it everything was ok. i looked up and there it was traveling accross. it was so bright it hurt my eyes. i watched it travel behind trees. then i went to my bedroom and looked out i saw the back of it. it was very low. i don't remember hearing any noise. it was as big as a 747.Maybe bigger.It did not blink it was solid.Silver and white.
content.summary: I saw a triangle bright like light builbs white all around it;to bright to be a airplane.

content.detailedDescription: We were having sort of a family reunion type picnic/cookout with a little over a dozen people.  we started seeing what looked like satellites moving(satellites resemble moving stars). anyway, we watched them move at ridiculously fast speeds directly above us.  some would form into one and then split up into multiple objects.  some would disappear and some would return in the same general location of the sky.  they looked just like stars you really couldn't make out any shapes or colors.  it occurred at night just when it was becoming dark enough out to see the stars.  was witnessed by almost everyone at the cookout.  was amazing.
content.summary: Multiple moving lights

content.detailedDescription: Was laying on trampoline stargazing in southern tulsa, oklahoma and noticed what appeared to be a black cylinder.  you could make it out in front of the twilight in the background.  it sat in one spot as if to evade detection and then turned into a spherical object that appeared to be churning or bubbling like some kind of part-liquid mass.  it slowly traveled northwest at low speed in this spherical shape.  was very odd.  was witnessed by myself and 2 other people.
content.summary: Strange black blob

content.detailedDescription: Was outside and noticed what looked like two lights side by side and 2 lights directly below the first too offset slightly.  you could make out what looked like a disc in the center at an angle.  was pretty big.  i'd say it was approximately 1/4 mile up in the sky and about 2 or 3 miles away from our location.  it traveled relatively slow and maintained altitude as it slowly traveled due north.  was witnessed by 5 people.
content.summary: 4 lights in disc formation

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were burning brush in a feild on our small farm three miles  from cowpens south carolina.I was just looking up at the stars .I first thought they were airforce jets.There were 5 round lights in a triangular shape.When they first appeared they were on eastern horizo nn at a very high altitude.Then they streaked across to the western horizon and stopped for about 30 seconds.Then they made a right angle turn staight up into outerspace or somewhere out of sight.While watching these objects my father and i did not speak.We just stood there in amazement
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five lights appeared in the sky then streaked across and then stopped  then made right angle turn up out of sight

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were burning brush in a feild on our small farm three miles  from cowpens south carolina.I was just looking up at the stars .I first thought they were airforce jets.There were 5 round lights in a triangular shape.When they first appeared they were on eastern horizo nn at a very high altitude.Then they streaked across to the western horizon and stopped for about 30 seconds.Then they made a right angle turn staight up into outerspace or somewhere out of sight.While watching these objects my father and i did not speak.We just stood there in amazement
content.summary: Five lights appeared in the sky then streaked across and then stopped  then made right angle turn up out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a friend's property stepping off his front porch...
the sound made me aware of the object 
i thought the object at first was a kc-10 extender of the us air force, but there were no red marker lights on the wings and no white marker lights on wing tips or tail.
the object was a circular white light when compared to the stars. it dwarfed the stars. it was going straight with noise behind it and started a gentle curver from south to southeast.
my reaction during it was to try to understand weather it was or was not a ufo...After seeing the object i could not identify the object. 
i lost sight of the object when the object's light went dark and blended with the dark sky.
it was a totally clear night sky and there were no objects obstructing my view.
content.summary: Bright white object bet 35k & 70k feet with deep roar sounding like rocketry but not sounding like space shuttle

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting into bed at my grandmas house.
the swaying of the trees seemed to intensify.
i was unsure at first.
it was the general saucer shape, but very colourful, and there were lights spinning all the way around.
it hovered at least 20 feet over the ground.  all most like it was peeking around the trees.  
i did nothing but stand theer in the short minutes it was there.  but once it was gone and i realized what it was , i panicked and ran down stairs to my grandma and told her what happened.  she didn't beleive me at first.  but i was so adimit she finally gave in 10 years later.
it finally zoomed away before i ran down stairs.
content.summary: It was short and i could hardly believed what i had saw, before even trying to call for someone
It was short and i could hardly believed what i had saw, before even trying to call for someone

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the yard lying on a sleeping bag.  i had been trying to astrally project but did mostly meditation.  while lying down i did wish to see a ufo about 10 min before the event.

i was lying on my side and looking into a sleeping bag and then instinctively i looked over my left shoulder at the sky.  and there was a gentle miracle magically growing to a bright solid white energy mass.  it expanded and shrank uniformly to a point that faded with a crisp snap.

i felt reassurance and gladness.

there is no multimedia attachments but there is a poll about mushrooms at: http://www.Metajournal.Net/_sophias_tongue_/2005/9/18/20/
content.summary: A flash of white light that expanded very evenly before contracting to a dot that kept moving at an even speed and faded

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on antelope island in the great salt lake, taking pictures of the buffalo. my wife said to me, "something strange is happening to that cloud," and so i snapped two shots of it. i didn't really think anything more of it at the time. when the picture was developed i noticed the object at the top of the frame, which i hadn't seen at the time. there is a second object, visible in the photo which appears to have been vectoring to intercept the primary object, but was no where near quick enough. it is visible at the very bottom of the frame.
content.summary: Object sliced through a cloud

content.detailedDescription:
i am a mufon state section director and field investigator, and consider myself fortunate to have had this first hand experience.

     i was working on a customer's air conditioning system when i overheard their comments and discussion. there were three women sitting at a poolside table.They were asking themselves, "what is that"? i then looked up and saw a bright chrome metallic object seeming to hover in the sky. i looked at my watch and noted 1505 hrs. i then measured the objects altitude using two handspreads which for me equates to approx. 50 degrees above the horizon.
     the primary witness ran into the house and retrieved a video camera after i asked if she had a pair of binoculars. while visually observing the object an jet airplane flew by the object although at a much higher altitude. the wings and fusilage of the airplane were easilly discernable. the object seemed to hover for many minutes flashing randomly with brilliant chrome flares. i took the camera from the witness and shot approx. 10 minutes of video trying to zoom and hold the camera steady as much as possible. the object slowly moved to the n.E. until it dissapeared into the distance.
     upon first seeing the object i looked for any sign of wings, or contrails. none were noted. primary witness called local tv station, but they apparently did not see anything.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While at customer's house working on her air conditioning, we all noticed a  hovering bright silver, metalic  object reflecting and pulsing sunlight.

content.detailedDescription: In august of this year 2005, cannot remember the exact date but do remember the exact time when i and 2 others observed the object in the sky for over 15 minutes. i had just gotten out of the shower about 6 pm, the sun was setting but the sky was not completely dark, i went to my back yard to grab a towel from the cloths line, when i immediately noticed a dark almost black object appeared to be circular very slowly travelling from east to west. as im accustomed to seeing other planes in the area, my immediate reaction was, how come this object does not have any lights on it what so ever especially since it was starting to get dark(for air safety reasons). then i called out to my brother and a friend who were in the kitchen at the time, and said quote'look at this weird object in the sky' they ran out and saw it as well. the object was very clear, it was very very very odd that it did not make a sound or have any lights what so ever, was just a circular dark object. it was moving east to west for a minute or so, then just stoped and hovered at that position for a good 5 minutes, then strangely started heading away from us, untill it vanished into the clouds at a distance. the second we all saw the object, we knew within a second that this was not ordinary, infact we were happy that we had seen it and laughing while staring at it, saying to each other i cannot beleive we are looking at a ufo. this was seen by 3 people and we all know for a fact that it was strange, and definately something that could not be explained. i can assure anyone it was clear and obviously a ufo, not a balloon, plane,bird or anything that could be explained away easly.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark object observed by 3 people in absolute clear sky hovering then moving.

content.detailedDescription:
Des moines: morning drive-time radio show station who began receiving phone calls from various locations in the state (iowa city, brooklyn, knoxville, des moines area, atlantic, 30 miles west of fort dodge,and from i-80 in the stuart - menlo area) within minutes following sighting at approximately 5:50 a.M.  most witnesses had the impression they were seeing a white-to-green ball of light close up, that is, within several miles of their location, although one witness in northern iowa thought it was in the omaha area some 100 plus miles sw of his position.

following show hosts verbally wondering about mufon, beverly trout, mufon state director for iowa, called in and was put on the air, giving telephone and e-mail address, and then when the show received lots of calls the following morning, with callers wondering what mufon had found through investigation, trout called in during a break and host put her on the air again.

investigated by telephone by beverly trout with 10 witnesses.....

white-to-green ball of light moving from east to west, with some "falling" motion specified by the witnesses, and with reports of 2 to 7 seconds duration, to most witnesses seeming to be at high altitude, i.E. above average commercial flight altitude of 35,000.

perceived speed of object shows some variance.  some witnesses indicate this was slower than a meteorite/falling-star event, indicating a somewhat floating motion.  others saw it as very fast, but still not in the falling-star/meteor category.

one witness sitting on his deck drinking coffee reports it 
went over his head at 90 degrees as it then headed on west.
he reports a smoke trail behind it, but no diminishing in size (and upon being questioned, none of the witnesses report the ball of light as diminishing in size as it seemed to move west and downward while in their line of sight.  two other witnesses indicate that they thought there might have been a little elongation (trail??) to the light

the witnesses are not sure what they saw, citing color, movement etc. as being a bit different than they think a meteor ought to look - although not ruling out that possibility.

one witness, a lady truck driver, on i-80 at mile marker 87 headed west to blair, nebraska, maintains that the light/object moved to within 1/4 mile of her position on i-80 and down over a field to the right (north side) of i-80, and at about the altitude of 300 feet the light simply went out.  she wanted to stop and go investigate, but had to deliver a load to blair at 8:00 a.M., so didn't have the time.  she estimates size of the light as size of semi-trailer and about ten (10) feet across, and that it was moving at no more than 50-75 miles per hour as it descended to the estimated 300 feet altitude over the field.

the witness west of fort dodge, iowa was looking sw, and if he had been seeing (at the same time) what the truck driver thought she saw, he'd have had to look sse.

from telephone conversations with the various witnesses, it would appear that mufon is left with an inconclusive investigation.....

questions that at present have no answer:
1 - was this only one (1) event??? with the possibility that something did come down close to the ground, and then move off briefly with lights out, and then perhaps move on to resume a colorful lighted passage on west???
2 - could there have been two (2) events (given the truck driver's perception; or was she simply way off in her estimation of distance and size?
3 - in some past cases ufos in trouble have been able to continue on their way after sometimes descending to a lower altitude; could this be an example?  who knows?

certainly, this remains an open case.
content.summary: White to green ball of light seen wide area of iowa; also report from south dakota to des moines call-in radio show
